item.title: 每日一题 2022_01_08
item.description: leetcode.cn 89.格雷编码 [最棒题解][https://leetcode-cn.com/problems/gray-code/solution/gray-code-jing-xiang-fan-she-fa-by-jyd/] 1func grayCode(n int) []int { 2 // n=0时，就是一个数0 3 ans:=make([]int, 1, 1<<n) 4 // a=上一行的数据 5 // b=上一行的数据翻转，然后每个元素前面加1(比如10， 变成110) 6 // 这一行的数据=a+b(数组连接) 7 // curRow=prevRow+Reverse(prevRow).map(v=>v+head) 8 head:=1 9 for i:=0; i<n; i++{ 10 for j:=len(ans)-1; j>=0; j--{ 11 ans=append(ans, head+ans[j]) 12 } 13 head=head<<1 14 } 15 return ans 16} leetcode.com 1463.Cherry Pickup II 最棒题解 1<div class="highlight"><pre tabindex="0" style="color:#f8f8f2;background-color:#272822;-moz-tab-size:4;-o-tab-size:4;tab-size:4"><code class="language-go" data-lang="go"><span style="margin-right:0.4em;padding:0 0.4em 0 0.4em;color:#7f7f7f"> 1</span><span style="color:#66d9ef">func</span> <span style="color:#a6e22e">cherryPickup</span>(<span style="color:#a6e22e">grid</span> [][]<span style="color:#66d9ef">int</span>) <span style="color:#66d9ef">int</span> { 2<span style="margin-right:0.
